There were 612 days between the Pulse shooting in Orlando and the shooting at my school in Parkland. For those 612 days, @FLGovScott did nothing to fix the issue of gun violence. Now that he’s announced his senate run I’d like to know if he has any plans to fix things nationally.

Gun violence doesn’t require a cool story — kids have to get buried, this has been normal for too long, we can stop this through simple reforms.

No one should feel the pain of losing someone from a bullet.
